        dp[3]=0, dp[1]=1, dp[2]=2.
        ans = |2-1| + |0-2| = 1+2=3. buffer = "3"

        tokenization: token = "3"
            result_second becomes 1. then compare "3"=="0" -> false. then next token = strtok(NULL, " ") -> NULL, so loop ends. result_second = 1. Then count the ones in 1 -> 1.
